title: Sky Group
summary: Sky Group Limited is a British media and telecommunications conglomerate, which is a division of Comcast, and headquartered in London, England. It has operations in the United Kingdom, Ireland, Germany, Austria, Switzerland and Italy. Sky is Europe's largest media company and pay-TV broadcaster by revenue (as of 2018),[3] with 23Â million subscribers and more than 31,000 employees as of 2019.[1][4] The company is primarily involved in satellite television, producing and broadcasting. The current CEO is Dana Strong.
